name: Moonlight Spectrum
description:
On the moon, there is dark and there is light. Extract colors and use them as keys to disclose the path. Tribute to the Pink Floyd. 

Submission to the impossijam game jam (https://itch.io/jam/impossijam)
with contrasting themes: COLOR IS THE KEY and BLACK & WHITE.

Credits:
music: Any Colour You Like - Pink Floyd
moon picture: the moon's surface (NASA)
